item.title: Between atom, sublime, vim and visual studio
item.description: I am compiling a few webpages that discuss the advantages and disadvantages of some markdown editors. They are: https://www.codementor.io/mattgoldspink/best-text-editor-atom-sublime-vim-visual-studio-code-du10872i7 https://comparisons.financesonline.com/atom-software-vs-sublime-text https://blog.takipi.com/sublime-vs-atom-text-editor-battles/ Atom vs Sublime
